metadata.scenario: Customer service interaction about a delayed package

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling about a package that's late. The tracking number is 1234567890.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for providing the tracking number. Let me look that up for you. One moment please... Okay, I see the package is currently in transit and is expected to be delivered tomorrow.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Tomorrow? But the original delivery date was last week! I'm getting really frustrated.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration, sir/madam. There was a delay due to unforeseen circumstances at the distribution center. We apologize for the inconvenience.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Unforeseen circumstances? What exactly does that *mean*? And why wasn't I notified?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Regarding the specifics of the delay, I, unfortunately, don't have that information available. As for notifications, sometimes they don't go out. I see in the system that an email was sent, however.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Well, I didn't get an email. So, what are my options? Is there anything I can do?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Since the package is expected to be delivered tomorrow, you can wait for it. If it doesn't arrive, please contact us again and we can initiate a claim.  We can also offer you a 10% discount on your next purchase as compensation for the delay.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, a discount is appreciated. I guess I'll wait until tomorrow. Thanks for your help.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: You're welcome. We appreciate your patience. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
